models.name: Stack
models.description: A linear data structure where elements follow Last-In-First-Out (LIFO) order.

models.name: Queue
models.description: A linear data structure where elements follow First-In-First-Out (FIFO) order.

models.name: singly linked list
models.description: A linear collection of nodes where each node points to the next.

models.name: Double Linked List
models.description: A linked list where each node points to both next and previous nodes

models.name: Bubble Sort
models.description: Repeatedly steps through the list, compares adjacent items, and swaps them if they are in the wrong order.

models.name: Selection Sort
models.description: Selects the smallest element from the unsorted part and moves it to the sorted part one at a time.

models.name: Insertion Sort
models.description: Builds the sorted array one item at a time by inserting elements into their correct position.

models.name: Merge Sort
models.description: A divide-and-conquer algorithm that splits the array, sorts the halves, then merges them back.

models.name: Quick Sort
models.description: Uses a pivot to partition the array into smaller sub-arrays and recursively sorts them.

models.name: Binary Tree
models.description: A tree structure where each node has up to two children.
